settings.title: TaHoma / Connexoon Settings
settings.intro: To let Homey control TaHoma / Connexoon please authorize Homey, by filling out the TaHoma / Connexoon login credentials.
settings.linkurl: Connection URL (Default is normally good for Tahoma and Connexoon)
settings.logout_description: This will logout from Tahoma and remove your credentials from the app.
settings.min_sync_speed: Minimum Sync Speed value is 30 seconds
settings.max_sync_speed: Maximum Sync Speed value is 90 seconds
settings.intro1: Use this if you have a device that is not supported.
settings.intro2: Tap on Get Log and wait for the data to appear. Then send the log.
settings.intro3: Contact @Adrian_Rockall on the community forum to describe which device is not supported.
settings.intro4: No personal data is captured or sent so if you don't contact me I will not be able to respond.
settings.pref_intro1: The app can poll for updates to keep Homey synchronised to the devices.
settings.pref_intro2: This puts a load on the Somfy servers so keep switched off if possible.
settings.pref_intro3: If you need updates for sensors then keep the interval as high as you can.

errors.on_pair_login_failure: Unable to login. Please go to the settings screen and provide access to TaHoma for Homey.

command_queued: Command queued wait for device to wakeup
